name: Lunarsea
developer: Live in the Game, LLC Self
publisher: Live in the Game, LLC  Self
description: Action on the High Seas with casual gaming on a physics-based PC and mobile platform.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Any
